story.kicker_image_caption: Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences notifies admission: Apply before June 3
story.storykicker: Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS), Tirupati has invited applications for admission to Master of Science (M.Sc) programme offered in various disciplines for the academic session 2016.
story.storybody:
The Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences (SVIMS), Tirupati has invited applications for admission to Master of Science (M.Sc) programme offered in various disciplines for the academic session 2016. The eligible candidates should apply online on or before June 3.

Educational qualification:
The candidates should possess a Bachelor's of Science (B.Sc) degree from a recognised university or institute.

Selection procedure:
The selection will be done on the basis of their performance in the entrance test.

Application fee:
The candidates can make the payment of Rs 500 in the form of a demand draft, drawn in favour of 'The Director, SVIMS, Tirupati payable at Tirupati'.

How to apply:
The eligible, interested candidates should apply online, the link for the same is http://svimstpt.ap.nic.in/. The candidates should submit a copy of their application form along with all essential documents to 'The Registrar, Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences, Alipiri Road, Tirupati - 517507' before the closing date, June 3.

For more details, the candidates should visit the official website.

READ: University of Calcutta Admissions 2016: Apply before June 17

For more updates, follow India Today Education
